attributes.action: Please support my on line petition for the Goverment to recruit and pay for more Admiral Nurses
attributes.additional_details: Please support my on line petition to recruit and pay for more Admiral Nurses we are always being told how many of us will fall pray to Dementia in the near future we need to plan now . Very few people even know what an Admiral Nurse is they support people and more importantly the carers of people with dementia I have been very lucky to have our own Nurse and would not have survived with out her help . Please help me to help others and give something back . Thank you
